Only If

Source: R/misc-manipulation.R
only_if.Rd

Adverb for conditionally skipping steps in a piped workflow.

only_if(condition)

Arguments

condition

Logical condition to be evaluated

Author

David Robinson, https://twitter.com/drob/status/785880369073500161

Examples

d <- tibble::as_tibble(mtcars)
d %>%
  only_if(TRUE)(dplyr::filter)(.data$mpg > 25)

#> # A tibble: 6 x 11
#>     mpg   cyl  disp    hp  drat    wt  qsec    vs    am  gear  carb
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1  32.4     4  78.7    66  4.08  2.2   19.5     1     1     4     1
#> 2  30.4     4  75.7    52  4.93  1.62  18.5     1     1     4     2
#> 3  33.9     4  71.1    65  4.22  1.84  19.9     1     1     4     1
#> 4  27.3     4  79      66  4.08  1.94  18.9     1     1     4     1
#> 5  26       4 120.     91  4.43  2.14  16.7     0     1     5     2
#> 6  30.4     4  95.1   113  3.77  1.51  16.9     1     1     5     2

d %>%
  only_if(FALSE)(dplyr::filter)(.data$mpg > 25)

#> # A tibble: 32 x 11
#>      mpg   cyl  disp    hp  drat    wt  qsec    vs    am  gear  carb
#>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.62  16.5     0     1     4     4
#>  2  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.88  17.0     0     1     4     4
#>  3  22.8     4  108     93  3.85  2.32  18.6     1     1     4     1
#>  4  21.4     6  258    110  3.08  3.22  19.4     1     0     3     1
#>  5  18.7     8  360    175  3.15  3.44  17.0     0     0     3     2
#>  6  18.1     6  225    105  2.76  3.46  20.2     1     0     3     1
#>  7  14.3     8  360    245  3.21  3.57  15.8     0     0     3     4
#>  8  24.4     4  147.    62  3.69  3.19  20       1     0     4     2
#>  9  22.8     4  141.    95  3.92  3.15  22.9     1     0     4     2
#> 10  19.2     6  168.   123  3.92  3.44  18.3     1     0     4     4
#> # … with 22 more rows
